Select 
[Document No_],
[Line No_],
[Type],
[No_],
[Sell-to Customer No_],
[Location Code],
[Description],
[Document Type],
[Description 2],
[Unit of Measure],
[Quantity],
[Outstanding Quantity],
[Qty_ to Invoice],
[Qty_ to Ship],
[Unit Price],
[Gross Weight],
[Shortcut Dimension 1 Code],
[Shortcut Dimension 2 Code],
[Qty_ Shipped Not Invoiced],
[Shipped Not Invoiced],
[Quantity Shipped],
[Quantity Invoiced],
[Outstanding Amount (LCY)],
[Shipped Not Invoiced (LCY)],
--[Reserved Quantity],
[Dimension Set ID],
--[Posting Date],
[Unit of Measure Code],
[Quantity (Base)],
[Outstanding Qty_ (Base)],
[Item Category Code],
[Amount To Customer],
[GST Group Code],
[GST Base Amount],
[GST _],
[Total GST Amount],
[HSN_SAC Code],
[PDA Generated],
--[ECOM],

from INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
where TABLE_NAME like '%Sales Line'
